Description: Lapis lazuli amuletic figure of a seated falcon-headed deity; headdress lost; suspension ring on the back.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Dr Joseph John Acworth
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.14
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2006-present, Glasgow, Kelvingrove Art Gallery and Museum, LT Loan Ancient Egypt British Museum Partnership Gallery
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs Marion Whiteford Acworth JP
